algorithm_technique: Frequency counting using hash maps (Counter) to find character differences and sum them.
problem_summary_simple: Find minimum character additions to make two strings anagrams of each other.
problem_summary_technical: Sum the absolute differences in character frequencies between the two strings.
key_insights: To make two strings anagrams, they must have the same character counts.
The number of steps is the total number of characters that need to be added to either string to match the other.
This is equivalent to summing the absolute differences of character counts for each character.
